strapiPost.title: Luxury Car Condos Under Construction in Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Site work has begun near Pinnacle Hills in Rogers on the Marque Collection Suites — which, as best we can describe, sounds like a community of storage units but waaaaay fancier.

Show Room: The first phase of the $35m development, let by entrepreneur Nick Dozier, will feature 52 units, ranging from 1,250ft2 to 3,750ft2 where tenants can display luxury cars, boats, motorcycles, or any fine collection from whiskey and wine to big game hunting trophies.

The Height of Luxury: Owners can customize their units however they want, including mezzanines, offices, bathrooms, bars, marble floors, etc. Phase two of the project will include 20 townhome-style units for residential use and amenities like a private clubhouse, fitness room, racing simulators, members’ lockers, bar, conference room, and private offices.

Learn more about this bougie development HERE.
